lead_paragraph: Ever wonder if you play better golf riding in a cart or walking? Ever wonder how many calories you burn in a typical round? Or if you would play better if you were in better shape? Ever wonder if golf is truly a sport?
snippet: Tests performed on a group of amateur golfers seemed to indicate that being in shape would help them play better.

headline.main: A Little Scientific Research for All Those 19th-Hole Debates

abstract: Tests performed on a group of amateur golfers seemed to indicate that being in shape would help them play better.
